titles.title: Recognizing the Desert Shield-Desert Storm Memorial Light at the Shrine of Our Lady of Grace in Columbia, New Hampshire, as a memorial of national significance.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E520)
Referred to the House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 3/4/1993--Introduced. Recognizes the Memorial Light at the Shrine of Our Lady of Grace located in Columbia, New Hamsphire, as a memorial of national significance.
